remarks: Measurability of a piecewise function: if ` F ` is measurable on subsets ` B ` and ` C ` of its domain, and these pieces make up all of ` A ` , then ` F ` is measurable on the whole domain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
statement:
mbfres2.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> RR ) $.
mbfres2.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfres2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` C ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbfres2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( B u. C ) = A ) $.
mbfres2 $p |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
